algorithms.demo

Class SearchableMaze3d

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.demo.SearchableMaze3d
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Searchable<Position>

    public class SearchableMaze3d
extends java.lang.Object
implements Searchable<Position>

    class SearchableMaze3d

    This class using object adapter to connect the Searchable interface to a maze3d problem.

    Implements Searchable interface

    overrides methodes- getStartState, getGoalState, getAllPossibleStates, getMoveCost

    Since:
    2016-08-30
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tal Oyar
    See Also:
    Searchable, Maze3d, State

      Constructors

      SearchableMaze3d(Maze3d maze)
      SearchableMaze3d constructor gets a 3d maze. and initializing the maze parameter

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<State<Position>> getAllPossibleStates(State<Position> currentState)
      getAllPossibleStates method gets the all the possible moves from a specific position in the maze
      State<Position> getGoalState()
      getGoaltState method gets the goal position from the 3d maze and initialize the goal state with it.
      double getMoveCost(State<Position> currState, State<Position> neighbor)
      getMoveCost method setting the cost of each move to be 1
      State<Position> getStartState()
      getStartState method gets the start position from the 3d maze and initialize the start state with it.
